content: Daivamaaya kartthaave! Thaalkkaalika jeevithatthilninnu verpettu ee vyarththhalokatthilninnu purappettirikkunna ee aathmaavu aashvaasavum santoshavum aanandavum niranya sthhalangallilekku uyirppu divasam vare ninte parishuddha maalaakhamaaraal vazhinadatthappeduvaan samgathiyaakkaname. Pithaavum puthranum parishuddharoohaayum aayullllove, ee aathmaavu mukhaprasaadatthode avide ninne ethirelkkumaaraakaname. Aammeen. Hosho..

Chintichen kuzhiyathil veenavareppol-haale...
Thunayattoru narane-ppolaayu nyaan.

Mrthiyaarnnore!-saubhaagyam
Ningallkkuththhaana-tthin naallil
Ullkkondoruyirin-thirumeyyum
Mochanamekum thirurakthamathum
Ningalle nirttheedum-valabhaage.

items.content: Aathmaakkallude srashdaavum shareerangallude nirmmithaavum, nirmmithamaayavayude sharanavum, srshdikallude prathyaashayum kabaradakkappettavarude punaruththhaanavum, marichupoyavarude uyirppum duഃkhichirikkunnavarude aashvaasavum, vishaadichirikkunnavarude aahlaadavum vilaapatthilirikkunnavarude santoshavum manovedanayil irikkunnavarude dhairyavumaaya kartthaavinu sthuthi. Thante daasante shavasamskkaara shushroosha nirvahikkappedunna ee samayatthum..........Bkulhun..

Aadyantamillaattha thejassum, mahaakaarunyavaanum sathyavaanum, maranamillaaymayude prabhayum jeevanum uravayum, sakalatthinteyum srashdaavum lokattheyum athile avasthhaantarangalleyum krameekarikkunnavanumaaya kartthaave! Nee bhayangkaranum ninte kalpanayil mahaneeyanum deerghakshamayullllavanum kaarunyavaanum aakunnu. Yaathoru rahasyavum ninte divyadrshdikku agocharamalla. Aalochanakallude aazhavum hrdayachintakallum thirusannidhiyil parasyamaayi vellippettirikkunnu. Ninte theerumaanangall aparimithangallum ninte maargangall durgrahangallumaakunnu. Maranatthe maayichukallayuvaanum manushyasamhaarakanaaya mahaasarppatthe kolluvaanumaayittu yeshumishihaayenna ninte vathsalaputhrane lokatthilekku nee ayaykkukayum thaalparyamulllla sakala aathmaakkallkkum rakshayum maranamillaaymayum avan prasamgikkukayum cheythu. Ninte kalpanaprakaaram kleshapoornnamaaya ee lokatthilninnu shreshdhavum anashvaravumaaya lokatthilekku nyangall ayaykkappedunnu. Kartthaadhikartthaavum irulokangallkkum adhikaariyumaayullllove! Ee thaalkkaalika jeevithamaakunna paradeshavaasatthilninnu verpettu yaathrayaayirikkunna ee ninte daasante shavasamskkaara shushrooshayude ee samayatthu thirusannidhiyil nyangall apekshayum praarththhanayum samarppikkunnu. Ivideninnu yaathrayaakki svargeeya bhavanangallil vasippikkunnavaraaya samaadhaana maalaakhamaarmoolam ivante aathmaavine nee kaikkollllaname. Kartthaave! Dushdaathmaakkallude pidiyilninnum ivante aathmaavine rakshichukollllaname. Aa ethiraalliyude bandhanatthil ninnu athine vidurtthaname. Thirunaamabhaktharum thiruvishdam aacharikkunnavarumaayavare chutti nilkkunnathupolulllla senakall ivanum labhikkumaaraakaname. Ninte manushyapreethiyaal ivante paapangall poornnamaayi pariharikkaname. Ivante thettukalle ninte dayayaal poornnamaayi kshamikkukayum cheyyaname.  Ivante yaathraykku ninte sahaayam parasyamaayi ayachukodukkaname. Krpaapoornnamaaya valamkai ivanu neettikkodutthu randaam maranamaakunna chuzhiyilninnu ivane uddharichukollllaname. Adrshyamaaya ninte shakthiyaal ivane sahaayikkaname. Pishaachukkallude bhayangkaramaaya ollividangallilninnu ivane rakshichukollllaname. Ivante pramaanalamghanangallkku thakkapole ivane nee vidhikkaruthe; thirusannidhiyil sarvvarum kuttakkaar thanneyaanallo. Kartthaave! Nyangallude svaabhaavikamaaya durbalathayil kanivuthonnaname. Nyangallil villikkappettirikkunnathaaya thirunaamattheyum ninte mahaakarunayeyum nyangallilum ivanilum orkkaname. Nyangallude vargatthinte rakshaykkuvendiyundaaya ninte ekaputhrante kashdaanubhavangall ninnodapekshikkumaaraakaname. Ninte krpayum karunayum ivantemel udikkumaaraakaname. Ivan vishvasichathaaya jayamulllla sleebaa+ ivan, vishuddhanmaarude samoohatthil vasippikkunna prakaasha sthambhamaayi bhavikkumaaraakaname. Nyangallude vamshashathruvaaya saatthaan thante dushdamaaya aagraham niraveraathe lajichu pokatthakkavannam ninte karuna ivanil undaakumaaraakaname. Kartthaave! Thirunaamabhakthanmaarkkulllla anugraheetha bhavanangallil etthunnathuvare ee ninte daasanu kottayum anuyaayiyum kaavalkkaaranum sahaayiyum aayirikkaname. Avide aadyantamillaatthathaaya ninte mahimayil ivan aanandikkumaaraakaname. Abrahaaminte madiyil vishramichukondu ellaa duഃkhangallum kleshangallum kashdathakallum vismarikkuvaan ivanu samgathiyaakkaname. Kartthaave! Ninte aaraadhakaraaya nyangalleyellaavareyum ivaykkellaam yogyaraakkittheerkkaname. Vedippullllathum aanandakaravum paaparahithavumaaya jeevithatthaal andhakaaratthinte dushdasenakallkku vidheyamaakaattha samaadhaanaparamaaya niryaanam nyangallum anubhavikkaan idayaakaname. Kartthaave! Karunaadrshdiyaal nyangalle kadaakshichu vilapichirikkunnavare aashvasippikkukayum duഃkhichirikkunnavare dhairyappedutthukayum mlaanavadanaraayirikkunnavarkku mukhaprasannatha nalkukayum cheyyaname. Ninne sthuthikkunna evarkkum ethusthhaanatthum avanavante aavashyaanusaranam nee sharanavum prathyaashayum aayirunnukondu avarude mukhatthuninnu kannuneerum duഃkhavum neekkikkallayaname daivame! Ninte mashihaayilulllla prathyaashayil munkootti ninte adukkalekku yaathrapurappettavarum shreshdhavum mahaneeyavumaaya avidutthe prathyakshathaye pratheekshichukondirikkunnavarumaaya nyangallude ellaa maathaapithaakkallkkum sahodareesahodaranmaarkkum gurukkanmaarkkum nyangallellaavareyum vahichirikkunna ninte krpayaal bhaagyakaramaaya bhavanangallil vishuddha nmaarodukoodiyulllla aashvaasam nalkaname. Aa prathyakshathaye lajaarahithamaaya prasannamukhangallodu koode ethirelkkuvaan nyangallum kaatthirikkunnu. Kartthaave! Munkootti nidrapraapichavarum ivide avasheshikkunnavarumaayi rakshitharum avidutthe kartthrthvatthinte daasarumaaya nyangallellaavarum aadyantamillaattha ninte raajyatthil vandyavum grahanaatheethavumaaya ninte naamattheyum ninte ekaputhraneyum ninte parishuddharoohaayeyum sthuthichu pukazhtthuvaan yogyaraayittheeraname. Hosho.....

content:
Vegam vannettheedenam
Naathhaa! Nin dayayen mumpil
En jeevaantyamadukkumpoll
Ennaathmaavin karmmangall
Prathidaanam nedidumpoll
Thunayaakillen nettangall
Ponninu vilayillavidengum
Angeeshoyaam deveshan
Vidhipeedhatthilirikkunnu.
Dhanikanu deenathayillengkil
Dhanamaalambam nalkilla
Deenanu shuddhathayillengkil
deenathayum thunayekeedaa
Satthamane naravathsalane!
Avidenmel daya thonnaname-
Nnarththhicheedunnen menmel.

Msheehaa raajaave! Sho-kam
Klesham mr-thi ivayeshaattha
/tshaashvatha jeevasthhaanatthil
/tparishuddhanmaarodoppam
Daasaathmaakkallkkaashvaa-sam
Mamgallapoorvvam nalkenam.

Naam daivaathmajaraayee-daan
Vaazhchayilu-padeshichoraam
/tjanakanmaareyorkkenam
/tdaivathanoojan svargatthil
Aashvaasam punyaathmaa-kkall-
Kkoppamavar-kkekeeda-tte.

Po-vuka sahajaa-the!
Bhoovaasam-nirasicho-lle!
Aa-raajakumaa-ran
Paarppikkum maniyara tha-nnil.
/tnee-vee-ttaareyum
/tsuthareyum verpettengkil
Vaa-navarude naattil
Ninneyavan-nivasippikkum.

Koottaayu nin slee-baa
Bheekaramaam kadavathilaarnnu
Paa-zhirullin se-naa
Nivahatthe paayikkatte.
/tslee-baa-tthaakkolaal
/tparudeesin vaathilileree-
Ttaa-nandatthaa-l nyaan
Nin krpaye vaazhttheedatte.

items.content: Sahodarare! Prathyaashayillaattha mattaallukalleppole nidrapraapikkunnavarekkurichu ningall duഃkhikkaruthennu arinyukollvaan nyaanaagrahikkunnu. Entukondennaal Yeshu marikkukayum punaruththhaanam cheykayum cheythu ennu naam vishvasikkunnu engkil aprakaaram thanne Daivam yeshuvilullppettu marichupoyavareyum avanodukoodi uyirppikkum. Nammude kartthaavinte varavingkal jeevanode sheshikkunnavaraaya namukku nidrapraapichavare pinthudarendivarikayillennu kartthaavinte vachanam aadhaaramaakki nyangall ningallodu parayunnu. Nammude kartthaavu pradhaana maalaakhaayude akampadi shabdam, daivatthinte kaahalladhvani ivayodu koodi svargatthil ninnirangivarum. Appoll mashihaayil ullppettavaraaya marichavar aadyame uththhaanam cheyyum. Pinne jeevanode sheshikkunnavaraaya naam-avarodu koode orumich-antareekshatthil kartthaavine ethirelpaanaayittu meghangallil edukkappedum. Angane ellaayppozhum naam nammude kartthaavinodorumichu sthhithi cheyyukayum cheyyum. Aakayaal ee vachanangallmoolam parasparam aashvasippichukollveen.

Veendum svargaraajyam manavaallanteyum manavaattiyudeyum ethirelppinaayittu deepeyashdikall edutthukondu purappetta patthu kanyakamaarkku sadrshamaayirikkum. Avaril anchuper buddhimathikallum anchuper buddhiheenakallum aayirunnu. Buddhiheenakall thangallude deepayashdikalle edutthu; ennakoode edutthilla. Aa buddhimathikall aakatte thangallude deepayashdikallodukoode paathangallil ennayum edutthu. Manavaallan thaamasichathu kondu avar ellaavarum mandichurangi. Arddharaathrikku, "ithaa manavaallan varunnu; avante ethirelpinu purappeduvin,” ennu aarppuvilliyundaayi. Appoll aa kanyakamaar ellaavarum ezhunnettu thangallude deepayashdikalle thelliyichu. Aa buddhiheenakall buddhimathikallod, “ithaa nyangallude deepayashdikall kettupoyathukondu ningallude ennayil ninnu kure nyangallkkum tharika;” ennu paranyu. Aa buddhimathikall marupadiyaayitt, "nyangallkkum ningallkkum mathiyaakaathe vannekkaam; ningall kachavadakkaarude adukkal poyi vaanguvin, ' ennu paranyu. Avar vaanguvaan poyappoll manavaallan vannu. Orungiyirunnavar avanodu koodi virunnu shaalayil praveshichu; vaathil adaykkappedukayum cheythu.  Odukkam aa matte kanyakamaarum vannu "prabho! Prabho! Nyangallkkum (vaathil) thurannu tharaname" ennu paranyu. Avan uttharamaayittu avarod, "ningalle nyaan ariyunnilla, ennu sathyamaayittu nyaan ningallodu parayunnu;" ennu paranyu. Aayathukondu aa divasattheyum aa samayattheyum ningallkkarinyukoodaatthathinaal jaagrathaayirippin.

content: Naamellaavarum duഃkhatthodum sangkadatthodum koode yogyamaayi ninnukondu daivatthinu preethikaramaaya shabdatthil kuriyelaayistton ennu ettuchollanam.
Maranamullllathaaya nyangallude vargatthinte yathhaarththha jeevanaakunna mashihaa thampuraane! Ninnodu nyangall apekshikkunnu.

Sathyavishvaasatthodukoodi nidrapraapichavarum ninte karunaykkaayi vaanychhichukondirikkunnavarumaaya ellaavarkkumvendi ninte karunayum paapamochanavum avarkku nalkappeduvaanaayi nyangall apekshikkunnu.
Naam moonnu praavashyam kuriyelaayisson ennu ettu chollanam.

Krpa nirayum mashihaa!-mrthayaam nin daasi-
Kkuththhaanam nalki-navyathayum svarge  modavume-ke-nam.

Kannukallil kanneer-shruthikallilaaraavam
Ayyamvilli vaayil-vyathhayakame naathhaa! Nalkanamaa-shvaa-sam.

Veedathilillavillaa-thodi nadannolle
Kabarathilekkentu-nnaparanmaar, naathhaa! Nalkanamaa-shvaa-sam.
Kanithinnaparaadham-haavaa cheythappoll maanavavamshatthil-mrthipooki naathhaa! Nalkanamaa-shvaa-sam.

Praarththhippin priyare en-per-
Kkellaayppo-zhumenne orppin.
/tnyaan mrthiyaal verpettenen
/tpaapatthe ortthanchunnen
Ee praarththhanayaal nyaan-ne-dum
Pinkoori-rullil samra-ksha.

Punyam cheythollaam daa-see!
Shlomo nalkaan vanneedu-
/tnneerenmaar, parudeesaayil
/tnirmmalamaam, ninnaathmatthe
Pookikkum santoshi-kkum
Dhaarmmikaro-ppam nee vaa-nil.

Deveshaa! En maa-rgatthil
Koottaayu ninnaa slee-baayaal
/ten jee-van kaatthee-denam.
/tkartthaave! Nyaayattheerppil
Skkeeppaamel moshdaaveppo-
Lampaa-lenne vaa--zhtthenam.

Raahel maranamadanyappoll
Yaakkobavalle sam-skaaram
/tcheytha-dhikam khedam-poondaan
/tee mrthiye prathi ke-zhendaa
Jeevan nalkumavall-kkullllil
Sthhithamaam-thirumeyu ra-ktha-ngall.

Sathyan-maartthaa mariyaam than-sodaranaa-kum
Lovo-sar cheenyennaalum-jeevan-kalppichon.
Nee che-nnappoll yaayeero-ssutha jeevi-chaall
Mrtharantyatthil jeevikkum-ninnaa-hvaanatthaal.

Mrthasa-ngkethe manmayanaa-maadaamo-daayu
Niyamam-thalllliya-manmayane-khedi-kkendaa nee;
Mrthiyum-jeevanumekeedum-daivasuthan-nyaa-
Nenno-thiya bahubalavaanaam-svargeeyan sathyan.

Chaathuryatthodu bhuvanatthe-marananuka-tthil
Bandhi-choru vijnyan srashdaa-vunna-thanaayu mevum
Nrpare-padavikallil ninnum bheekaramaa-kum
Vidhika-rtthaakkalle bharanatthil-ninnum - neekkunnu.

Thrppaa-vana thanuvoduyirin-rudhiravume-ttoru
Vishvaa-sikall mrtharettidumee dhoopa-tthaal punyam.
Jeeva-pradanaam mashihaa nin-daivikamaam vala-
Bhaaga-tthavar nilakondange-sthuthi-paa-deedatte.

/Tdaivame! Ninte krpayin prakaaram... Haale
Snehamodetthiya salputhraa-mrthiyettone!
Nyangalle randaam mrthiyeennum kanivaal kaakka.

/tente anyaayatthilninn.... Haaleluyyaa
Kriyakallkkoppam sakalarkkum-phalamekumpoll
Neethi nimittham vidhigeham-bahubheethikaram.

/tninakku virodhamaayitthanne... Haaleluyyaa
Ninnude neethiye en dosham-lamghichengkil
Nyaan narakattheennozhiyum nin-varasampatthaal.

/tennaal neethiyil nee ishdappettu... Haaleluyyaa
Anuthaapatthinnangidami-llennevam nyaan
Kellppathinaalen sodarare! Khedikkunnen.

/tninte aanandavum santoshavum... Haaleluyyaa
Mrthiyaal mrthare mrthareennum maayichone!
Eesho nrpathe! Nin krpaye vaazhtthum nyangall.

/tdaivame! Vedippulllla hrdayatthe... Haaleluyyaa
Jeevanuyirppil sakalarkkum - nalkaan mrthanaayu
Jeevichone! Sakaleshaa-thmajane sthothram.

/tennaalo ninte aanandavum... Haaleluyyaa
Valiya vellichamudichallo-mrthalokatthil
Asthhikallinmelaashissaam-panineer thooki.

/tente rakshayude daivamaaya... Haaleluyyaa
Mrthalokatthil sleebaayen - koottaakatte
Vellumuyirppil dushdane nyaan-maranattheyum.

/tentennaal balikallil... Haalelooyyaa
Maranatthin kaattadiyetten jeevan maanyu
Nin sathyaathmaavetthi eni-kkunarvvekatte.

/tninte ishdatthaal sehiyonodu... Haaleluyyaa
Kabareennuyirodu parudeesil-ninne ettum
Thaathaathmaja vimalaathmaavi-nnennum sthothram.
Kartthaavinte bhavanatthilekku naam pokunnu ennu avar ennodu paranyappoll nyaan santoshichu.

Ningallil ninnen-priyare! Piriyunnen
Sveekaranam nyaan nedaanarththhippin.
Oorshleme, ente kaalukall ninte vaathilukallil nilkkunnu.
Kottayaal chuttappettirikkunna pattanam pole oorshlem paniyappettirikkunnu.
Avidekku gothrangall, kartthaavinte gothrangall thanne, israayelinte saakshyatthinaayi kartthaavinte naamatthe sthothram cheyvaan kayarichellunnu.

Mrthiye kashdam-saatthaane! Kashdam
Ningade bharanam-mishihaa maayikkum.
Avide nyaayaasanangall, daaveedugrhatthile nyaayaasanangall thanne, sthhithicheyyunnu.
Oorshleminte kushalam anveshippin, ninte snehithanmaar dhairyamaayirikkatte. Ninte kotthallangallil samaadhaanavum ninte kottaarangallil samthrpthiyum undaakatte.
Ente sahodaranmaarum snehithanmaarum nimittham ninnil samaadhaanam undaakatte ennu nyaan parayum. Nammude daivamaaya kartthaavinte aalayam nimittham nyaan ninte nanma anveshikkum.

Aardrathayaal naathhaa devaa!
Daasikkekaname punyam
Nin mahimodaya naall thannil
Nirtthaname valamaayivalle.

Nettatthe nettakkaarkkum
Veedine vaazhvorkkum vitten
Deveshaa en maargatthil
Nee koottaayu ninneedenam.

Orkkenne mashihaa mannaa!
Nee ghosham vanneedumpoll
Eeyaathmaavinnaashvaasam
Dharmmishdharkkoppam nalka.

Aardrathayaal naathhaa devaa!
Daasikkekaname punyam
Nin mahimodaya naall thannil
Nirtthaname valamaayivalle.
Shavasamskkaara shushrooshakramam 2000 em. O. Si. Pablikkeshan‍su
